info.description: Transparent smart contracts, instant transactions, and a decentralized referral system
info.documentationDesc: Complete guides to understand how the X3 matrix system works and how to maximize your earnings.
info.instantPayoutsDesc: Receive SOL directly to your wallet. No delays, no intermediaries. Smart contract handles everything.
info.referralSystemDesc: Earn 13%, 8%, and 5% from your referral lines. Build your network and grow your passive income.

technology.description: Fully autonomous smart contract with X3 matrix model, instant payouts, and cryptographic security
technology.x3MatrixDesc: Each level operates as a queue-based X3 matrix. When you activate a level, you enter a global queue. Every 3 activations after you fill your slots, completing a cycle. You receive 60% from each slot fill, then automatically re-enter the queue for unlimited cycles.
technology.instantPayoutsDesc: Smart contract distributes payments instantly: 60% to level owner, 13% to referrer line 1, 8% to line 2, 5% to line 3, and 14% to platform treasury. All transfers happen in a single atomic transaction — no delays, no intermediaries.
technology.sixteenLevelsDesc: The system has 16 levels with fixed prices from 0.05 SOL (Level 1) up to 8.7 SOL (Level 16). Each level has its own independent queue. Higher levels mean higher payouts per slot fill. Activate levels in any order you prefer.
technology.replayProtectionDesc: Every transaction uses a unique nonce stored in a TxGuard account. This prevents replay attacks and ensures each activation is processed exactly once. The smart contract validates all PDAs cryptographically before any transfer.
technology.globalQueueDesc: Each level maintains a LevelPool with paginated QueuePages (64 players per page). When a page fills up, a new page is created automatically. The queue ensures fair, first-come-first-served distribution of slot fills.
technology.referralChainDesc: When you register, your 3-level upline is recorded on-chain (upline1, upline2, upline3). They receive bonuses from your activations only if they have the same level active. Otherwise, bonuses go to the platform treasury.

mechanics.description: Earn, upgrade, and play through decentralized smart levels powered by Solana smart contracts
mechanics.activateLevelDesc: Choose any level and activate it directly on-chain. Ownership is permanently recorded on the Solana blockchain.
mechanics.playRecycleDesc: Each level auto-cycles after three slots close — rewards are distributed instantly and the level reopens automatically.
mechanics.earnUpgradeDesc: Collect rewards in SOL and unlock higher levels for greater returns in the decentralized ecosystem.

partner.title: Partner Program
partner.subtitle: Invite friends and earn 50% bonus from their activations

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to help you understand and start with Solana Game
faq.q1: What is Solana Game and how does it work?
faq.a1: Solana Game is a decentralized matrix platform running entirely on Solana smart contracts. When you activate a level, you join a global queue. As new players activate the same level after you, they fill your 3 slots. Once all 3 slots are filled, you receive payouts and automatically re-enter the queue. This cycle repeats indefinitely — one activation gives you unlimited earning potential.
faq.q2: How many levels are there and what do they cost?
faq.a2: There are 16 levels with fixed prices in SOL: L1 = 0.05, L2 = 0.18, L3 = 0.36, L4 = 0.68, L5 = 1.1, L6 = 1.55, L7 = 2.1, L8 = 2.65, L9 = 3.25, L10 = 3.9, L11 = 4.65, L12 = 5.45, L13 = 6.4, L14 = 7.35, L15 = 8.0, L16 = 8.7 SOL. Each level operates independently with its own queue — you can activate any level in any order.
faq.q3: How much do I earn and where does the money go?
faq.a3: When someone activates a level, payments are distributed instantly: 60% goes to the queue leader (level owner), 13% to their 1st line referrer, 8% to 2nd line, 5% to 3rd line, and 14% to platform treasury. Per cycle (3 slots filled), you receive 180% of the level price. All transfers happen atomically in one blockchain transaction.
faq.q4: How does the referral program work?
faq.a4: When you register, your referral chain is recorded on-chain (3 levels deep). Your referrers earn 13%, 8%, and 5% from each of your level activations. Important: referral bonuses only apply if your upline has the same level active. If not, their share goes to treasury. This incentivizes everyone to activate more levels.
faq.q5: What happens after my 3 slots are filled?
faq.a5: Your level automatically 'recycles' — your slots reset to 0, your cycle counter increases by 1, and you re-enter the queue at the end. You keep your position and continue earning from the same level activation forever. There is no limit to how many cycles you can complete.
faq.a6: Step 1: Connect your Phantom wallet (or another Solana wallet). Step 2: Register your player profile — this creates your on-chain account and records your referrer. Step 3: Activate Level 1 for 0.05 SOL. Step 4: Share your referral link to earn bonuses when others join. You can monitor your slots, cycles, and earnings in real-time on your dashboard.
faq.q7: Is my money safe? Can anyone steal my funds?
faq.a7: Your funds are completely safe. The platform runs on verified, immutable smart contracts — no one (including developers) can modify the code or access your wallet. Payments go directly wallet-to-wallet without any intermediaries. The contract includes TxGuard protection against duplicate transactions. You never give custody of your funds to anyone.
faq.q8: What if no one activates after me?
faq.a8: Your position in the queue is permanent and never expires. You simply wait until new players activate the level. The queue is global — all players worldwide share the same queue for each level. The more popular the level, the faster your slots fill. Higher levels may take longer but offer larger payouts.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: Please read this disclaimer carefully before using Solana Program X3. By accessing or using the platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.
disclaimer.importantNoticeText: Cryptocurrency investments carry high risk. Only invest what you can afford to lose. This platform operates on immutable smart contracts — transactions cannot be reversed.
disclaimer.acceptanceText: By using Solana Program X3, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this disclaimer and all applicable terms and conditions.

natureOfPlatform.title: Nature of the Platform
natureOfPlatform.content:
Solana Program X3 is a decentralized application (dApp) built on the Solana blockchain. The platform operates through immutable smart contracts deployed on-chain. Once deployed, the smart contract code cannot be modified, altered, or controlled by any party, including the developers.

The platform facilitates a matrix-based system where participants can activate levels and receive payments based on the mechanics defined in the smart contract. All transactions are executed automatically by the blockchain according to the predefined rules.

noFinancialAdvice.title: No Financial Advice
noFinancialAdvice.content:
Nothing on this platform constitutes financial, investment, legal, or tax advice. The information provided is for educational and informational purposes only. You should consult with qualified professionals before making any financial decisions.

Participating in blockchain-based platforms involves significant risks. Past performance does not guarantee future results. The value of cryptocurrencies can fluctuate significantly, and you may lose some or all of your investment.

riskAcknowledgment.title: Risk Acknowledgment
riskAcknowledgment.content:
By using Solana Program X3, you acknowledge and accept the following risks:

• Smart Contract Risk: While the code has been carefully developed, no smart contract is completely free from potential vulnerabilities or bugs.

• Market Risk: The value of SOL and other cryptocurrencies can be highly volatile and may result in significant losses.

• Regulatory Risk: Cryptocurrency regulations vary by jurisdiction and may change. It is your responsibility to ensure compliance with applicable laws.

• Network Risk: The Solana blockchain may experience congestion, outages, or other technical issues that could affect transactions.

• Loss of Access: If you lose access to your wallet or private keys, your funds may be permanently inaccessible.

noGuarantees.title: No Guarantees
noGuarantees.content:
The platform makes no guarantees regarding:

• The amount or timing of any earnings or returns
• The continued operation of the platform
• The availability or functionality of any features
• The accuracy of any information displayed
• The actions of other participants

Your results depend entirely on the activity of other participants and the mechanics of the smart contract. There is no guarantee that you will receive any payments or recover your initial investment.

yourResponsibilities.title: Your Responsibilities
yourResponsibilities.content:
As a participant, you are solely responsible for:

• Conducting your own research before participating
• Securing your wallet and private keys
• Understanding the mechanics of the platform
• Complying with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction
• Reporting any earnings for tax purposes as required
• Making informed decisions about your participation

You should only participate with funds you can afford to lose completely.

jurisdictionalRestrictions.title: Jurisdictional Restrictions
jurisdictionalRestrictions.content:
The platform may not be available or may be restricted in certain jurisdictions. It is your responsibility to determine whether your use of the platform is legal in your jurisdiction.

By accessing and using the platform, you represent and warrant that you are legally permitted to do so in your jurisdiction and that you will comply with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws and regulations.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content:
The platform integrates with third-party services including:

• Solana Blockchain Network
• Wallet Providers (Phantom, Solflare, etc.)
• RPC Providers

We have no control over these third-party services and are not responsible for their availability, security, or any issues arising from their use.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content:
To the maximum extent permitted by law, the developers, contributors, and any associated parties shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages arising from:

• Your use of or inability to use the platform
• Any transactions made through the platform
• Any unauthorized access to your wallet or funds
• Any errors or omissions in the smart contract code
• Any other matter relating to the platform

This limitation applies regardless of the legal theory and even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content:
This disclaimer may be updated from time to time. While the smart contract code is immutable, the front-end interface and this disclaimer may be modified. It is your responsibility to review this disclaimer periodically for any changes.

Continued use of the platform after any modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
If you have any questions about this disclaimer or the platform, please reach out through our official Telegram support channel.

Remember: Never share your private keys or seed phrase with anyone, including anyone claiming to be from our team.

informationPage.title: How It Works
informationPage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the platform
informationPage.whatIsThisDesc: This is a decentralized application on Solana blockchain. Everything runs automatically through smart contracts — no admins, no middlemen. You activate levels, earn when others join after you, and the process repeats forever.
informationPage.transparentDesc: All transactions visible on Solana blockchain. Nothing hidden.
informationPage.automaticDesc: Smart contract handles payments. No delays, no approvals needed.
informationPage.unlimitedDesc: Each level can earn forever. No limits on cycles or earnings.
informationPage.step1Desc: Choose any level from L01 to L16. Pay the activation price once. You now own this level and enter the queue.
informationPage.step2Desc: When 3 other players activate the same level after you, each one pays you 60% of the level price. That means 3 payments total.
informationPage.step3Desc: After receiving 3 payments, your level automatically recycles. You go back to the queue and can earn again.
informationPage.step4Desc: The cycle repeats indefinitely. One activation = unlimited earning potential as long as new players keep joining.
informationPage.moneyGoesDesc: When someone activates a level, their payment is instantly split:
informationPage.exampleDesc: L01 costs 0.05 SOL. When 3 people activate after you:
informationPage.levelPricesDesc: 16 levels available. Higher levels = higher earnings per cycle.
informationPage.referralBonusesDesc: When someone you invited earns from their levels, you also earn a bonus:
informationPage.referralNote: Note: You only receive referral bonuses for levels you have activated. If you don't have L05 active, referral bonuses from L05 go to the platform.
informationPage.q1: Do I need to activate levels in order?
informationPage.a1: No. You can activate any level at any time. L01 and L16 are completely independent.
informationPage.q2: What happens when my cycle completes?
informationPage.a2: Your level automatically goes back to the queue. You can earn from it again and again.
informationPage.a3: Once activated, a level works forever. You cannot lose it. All payments are guaranteed by the smart contract.
informationPage.a4: Instant. The moment someone activates, SOL goes directly to your wallet. No delays.
informationPage.q5: What if I have no referrals?
informationPage.a5: You still earn 60% from your levels. Referral bonuses are extra income on top.

informationPage.activateLevelsDesc: Go to Levels page, choose a level, click Activate. Confirm in wallet. Done.

docsPage.title: Documentation
docsPage.label: Documentation
docsPage.heading: How Solana Program X3 Works
docsPage.description: Complete technical documentation to understand the X3 matrix system, payout mechanics, and how to maximize your earnings.
docsPage.footerText: Solana Program X3 — Decentralized Matrix on Solana Blockchain

content1.heading: What is Solana Program X3?
content1.text:
Solana Program X3 is a fully decentralized matrix system built on the Solana blockchain. It operates through verified smart contracts with no central control, meaning no one can modify the rules or access your funds.

The platform uses an X3 matrix model where each level has a global queue. When you activate a level, you enter the queue. As new players activate the same level, they fill your slots (3 slots per cycle). Once all slots are filled, you receive payouts and automatically re-enter the queue for unlimited cycles.

content2.heading: Key Features
content2.text:
• 16 independent levels with fixed prices (0.05 - 8.7 SOL)
• 3 slots per cycle with automatic recycling
• 60% payout to level owner per activation
• 26% total referral rewards (13% + 8% + 5%)
• Instant wallet-to-wallet transfers
• No withdrawal delays or intermediaries
• Immutable smart contract code

content3.heading: Why Solana Blockchain?
content3.text:
Solana was chosen for its exceptional performance:

• Transaction Speed: ~400ms confirmation time
• Low Fees: Fractions of a cent per transaction
• High Throughput: 65,000+ transactions per second
• Decentralization: Thousands of validators worldwide
• Proven Track Record: One of the top blockchains by TVL

content4.heading: How You Earn
content4.text:
There are two ways to earn on the platform:

1. Level Ownership: Activate levels and receive 60% from each player who activates after you (3 payments = 180% per cycle)

2. Referral Bonuses: Invite others and earn 13%, 8%, and 5% from your 3-line network

Both earning methods work simultaneously and compound your income.

content5.heading: Smart Contract Transparency
content5.text:
The entire platform runs on verified, open-source smart contracts:

• Contract address is publicly visible on Solana Explorer
• All transactions are recorded on the blockchain
• Anyone can verify the code and logic
• No hidden functions or backdoors
• Completely trustless operation

content1.heading: Level Prices
content1.text:
The system has 16 levels with the following fixed prices in SOL:

Level 1: 0.05 SOL    Level 9: 3.25 SOL
Level 2: 0.18 SOL    Level 10: 3.90 SOL
Level 3: 0.36 SOL    Level 11: 4.65 SOL
Level 4: 0.68 SOL    Level 12: 5.45 SOL
Level 5: 1.10 SOL    Level 13: 6.40 SOL
Level 6: 1.55 SOL    Level 14: 7.35 SOL
Level 7: 2.10 SOL    Level 15: 8.00 SOL
Level 8: 2.65 SOL    Level 16: 8.70 SOL

Each level operates independently with its own global queue. You can activate levels in any order.

content2.heading: How Levels Work
content2.text:
1. You activate a level by paying the fixed price
2. Your activation is recorded on-chain and you enter the global queue
3. The next 3 players who activate the same level fill your slots
4. You receive 60% of each player's payment (180% total per cycle)
5. After 3 slots are filled, you automatically re-enter the queue
6. This cycle repeats infinitely from a single activation

content3.heading: Level Independence
content3.text:
Each of the 16 levels operates completely independently:

• Separate queue for each level
• No prerequisites — activate any level at any time
• Multiple levels can be active simultaneously
• Each level earns separately
• Progress on one level doesn't affect others

content4.heading: Earnings Per Level
content4.text:
Your earnings per cycle (3 slots filled) for each level:

L1: 0.09 SOL    L9: 5.85 SOL
L2: 0.32 SOL    L10: 7.02 SOL
L3: 0.65 SOL    L11: 8.37 SOL
L4: 1.22 SOL    L12: 9.81 SOL
L5: 1.98 SOL    L13: 11.52 SOL
L6: 2.79 SOL    L14: 13.23 SOL
L7: 3.78 SOL    L15: 14.40 SOL
L8: 4.77 SOL    L16: 15.66 SOL

Formula: Level Price × 60% × 3 slots = Cycle Earnings

content5.heading: Auto-Recycle Mechanism
content5.text:
When your 3 slots are filled, your level automatically recycles:

• Your slots counter resets to 0
• Your cycles counter increases by 1
• You're moved from queue head to queue tail
• You continue earning without any action
• No additional payment required

This creates unlimited earning potential from a single activation.

content1.heading: Queue Structure
content1.text:
Each level maintains a LevelPool with paginated QueuePages. Key features:

• Each page holds up to 64 players
• When a page fills up, a new page is automatically created
• Players are processed in first-come-first-served order
• Your position is permanent and never expires
• After each cycle completion, you re-enter at the queue tail

content2.heading: Queue Processing
content2.text:
When a new player activates a level:

1. The smart contract identifies the queue head (first player in line)
2. This player's slots_filled counter increases by 1
3. Payment is distributed (60% to owner, referrals, treasury)
4. If slots_filled reaches 3, the level recycles:
   - cycles counter increases by 1
   - slots_filled resets to 0
   - Player is removed from head and added to tail
5. The new player also enters the queue tail

content3.heading: Fair Distribution
content3.text:
The queue system ensures fair treatment for all participants:

• First-come, first-served — no favoritism
• No way to skip or manipulate queue position
• Everyone waits their turn equally
• Smart contract enforces the rules automatically
• Transparent and verifiable on-chain

content4.heading: Queue Speed
content4.text:
How fast your slots fill depends on level activity:

• Lower levels (L1-L5): More players, faster fills
• Higher levels (L11-L16): Fewer players, slower fills
• Global activity affects all queues
• Your queue position matters — earlier = faster

Tip: Monitor queue activity in your dashboard to track progress.

content5.heading: Permanent Position
content5.text:
Once you activate a level, your position never expires:

• No timeout or expiration
• Queue persists forever on blockchain
• You'll receive payments even after months
• No maintenance or renewal needed
• Fully passive once activated

content1.heading: Payment Breakdown
content1.text:
Every activation distributes 100% of the level price:

• 60% → Level Owner (queue head)
• 13% → Referrer Line 1 (upline1)
• 8% → Referrer Line 2 (upline2)
• 5% → Referrer Line 3 (upline3)
• 14% → Platform Treasury

All transfers happen atomically in a single Solana transaction. No delays, no pending states.

content2.heading: Earnings Calculation
content2.text:
Per cycle (3 slots filled), you earn:
60% × 3 = 180% of the level price

Example for Level 5 (1.10 SOL):
• Per slot: 0.66 SOL (60% of 1.10)
• Per cycle: 1.98 SOL (180% of 1.10)
• ROI per cycle: +80% profit

There is no limit to cycles. One activation = unlimited earning potential.

content3.heading: Instant Transfers
content3.text:
Payments are made instantly via smart contract:

• No pending states or delays
• Direct wallet-to-wallet transfers
• SOL appears in your wallet immediately
• No manual claiming required
• No minimum withdrawal amount

content4.heading: Total Earning Potential
content4.text:
If you activate all 16 levels and complete multiple cycles:

Total level cost: ~42 SOL
Per cycle earnings: ~100 SOL (all levels)

Plus referral bonuses from your network can significantly increase your income. The more levels you activate and the larger your network, the higher your earnings.

content5.heading: Tracking Your Earnings
content5.text:
Monitor your income in real-time:

• Dashboard shows slots filled per level
• View completed cycles count
• Track total SOL earned
• See pending slot fills
• Transaction history available

All data is fetched directly from the blockchain.

content1.heading: How Referrals Work
content1.text:
When you register, your referral chain is recorded on-chain:

• upline1: Your direct referrer (earns 13%)
• upline2: Your referrer's referrer (earns 8%)
• upline3: Third level up (earns 5%)

Important: Referral bonuses only apply if your upline has the SAME level active. If they don't, their share goes to the platform treasury instead.

content2.heading: Building Your Network
content2.text:
To maximize referral earnings:

1. Share your referral link (contains your player PDA)
2. When someone registers through your link, you become their upline1
3. You earn 13% from every level they activate (if you have it active)
4. You also earn 8% from their referrals (your line 2)
5. And 5% from line 3 referrals

The key is to activate all 16 levels yourself to capture maximum referral income.

content3.heading: Your Referral Link
content3.text:
Your unique referral link contains your Player PDA:

https://[domain]/?ref=[your_player_pda]

Share this link anywhere:
• Social media (Twitter, Telegram, Discord)
• YouTube videos and descriptions
• Blog posts and forums
• Direct messages to friends

Anyone who registers through your link becomes your permanent referral.

content4.heading: Level Matching Rule
content4.text:
Critical rule: You only earn referral bonuses for levels YOU have active.

Example:
• You have L1, L2, L3 active
• Your referral activates L5
• You earn 0% because you don't have L5

Solution: Activate all 16 levels to capture 100% of possible referral income.

content5.heading: Network Growth
content5.text:
Your network grows automatically through 3 lines:

Line 1: People you invite directly (13%)
Line 2: People your Line 1 invites (8%)
Line 3: People your Line 2 invites (5%)

Total referral potential: 26% of every activation in your 3-line network. This creates powerful passive income.

content6.heading: Referral Earnings Example
content6.text:
If you have 10 active referrals and each activates L5 (1.10 SOL):

Line 1 (10 people): 10 × 1.10 × 13% = 1.43 SOL

If each of those invites 5 more (Line 2):
50 × 1.10 × 8% = 4.40 SOL

If Line 2 invites 5 each (Line 3):
250 × 1.10 × 5% = 13.75 SOL

Total from just L5: 19.58 SOL

content1.heading: Smart Contract Security
content1.text:
The platform implements multiple security measures:

• TxGuard: Each transaction uses a unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
• PDA Verification: All accounts are cryptographically validated
• Atomic Transfers: Payments happen in a single transaction (all or nothing)
• Immutable Code: Smart contract cannot be modified after deployment
• No Admin Keys: No one can drain funds or change rules

content2.heading: Your Funds Are Safe
content2.text:
• You never give custody of your wallet to anyone
• Payments go directly wallet-to-wallet via smart contract
• No deposit/withdrawal system — your SOL stays in your wallet
• All transactions are publicly verifiable on Solana Explorer
• The contract has no admin functions that could steal funds

content3.heading: Verified on Solana Explorer
content3.text:
The smart contract is fully transparent:

• Contract address publicly available
• All code verified and readable
• Every transaction visible on Explorer
• Account states can be inspected
• No hidden logic or functions

You can independently verify everything.

content4.heading: No Rug Pull Possible
content4.text:
The contract design prevents any form of rug pull:

• No owner withdrawal functions
• No pause or freeze mechanisms
• No upgradeable proxy patterns
• Funds flow directly between wallets
• Platform treasury is transparent

Even developers cannot access your funds.

content5.heading: Wallet Security Tips
content5.text:
Keep your wallet safe:

• Never share your seed phrase with anyone
• Use hardware wallet for large amounts
• Verify transaction details before signing
• Only connect to the official platform URL
• Be aware of phishing attempts
• Store seed phrase offline securely

content6.heading: Transaction Protection
content6.text:
Every transaction is protected by TxGuard:

• Unique nonce prevents duplicate transactions
• Protects against replay attacks
• Ensures each activation is processed once
• Automatic validation before execution
• Failed transactions are safely reverted

content1.heading: Step-by-Step Guide
content1.text:
1. Install Phantom Wallet
   Download from phantom.app and create your wallet

2. Fund Your Wallet
   Transfer SOL to your Phantom wallet address

3. Connect Wallet
   Click Connect Wallet on our platform

4. Register Player
   Create your on-chain player profile (one-time)

5. Activate Level 1
   Pay 0.05 SOL to activate your first level

6. Share & Earn
   Copy your referral link and invite others

content2.heading: Tips for Success
content2.text:
• Start with Level 1 and work your way up
• Activate as many levels as you can afford
• Share your referral link on social media
• Remember: referral bonuses require matching active levels
• Monitor your dashboard for slot fills and cycles
• Higher levels = higher payouts but slower queue movement

content3.heading: Supported Wallets
content3.text:
The platform supports popular Solana wallets:

• Phantom (recommended)
• Solflare
• Backpack
• Ledger (via Phantom)
• Other Solana-compatible wallets

We recommend Phantom for the best experience.

content4.heading: Getting SOL
content4.text:
You need SOL to participate. Ways to get SOL:

• Buy on exchanges (Binance, Coinbase, Kraken)
• Use fiat on-ramps (MoonPay, Transak)
• Swap from other crypto
• Receive from other users

Minimum needed: ~0.06 SOL for Level 1 + fees

content5.heading: Registration Process
content5.text:
One-time player registration:

1. Connect your wallet
2. Click 'Register' button
3. Approve transaction in wallet
4. Your player PDA is created on-chain
5. You're ready to activate levels

Registration requires a minimum balance of 0.0030 SOL to cover transaction fees.

content6.heading: Using Your Dashboard
content6.text:
After registration, your dashboard shows:

• Active levels and their status
• Slots filled and cycles completed
• Total earnings (estimated)
• Your referral link
• Transaction history
• Level activation buttons

content7.heading: Common Questions
content7.text:
Q: What if I lose my referrer's link?
A: You can register with the default referrer.

Q: Can I change my referrer?
A: No, referral chains are permanent on-chain.

Q: What's the minimum investment?
A: Level 1 costs just 0.05 SOL.

Q: Is there a time limit?
A: No, your levels work forever once activated.

levelDetailPage.step1Desc: you enter the queue and wait for 3 players to activate after you.
levelDetailPage.step2Desc: each time someone activates, you receive {percent}% of their payment.
levelDetailPage.step3Desc: after 3 payments, your level is recycled back to queue automatically.
levelDetailPage.step4Desc: you can earn from this level indefinitely as long as new players keep joining.
levelDetailPage.noteText: This level will continue earning as long as new players join. Each cycle is independent.
